items.sentence: I don\'t see any reason why I have to apologize.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary have much in common.
I don\'t want Tom to think he has to protect me.
I don\'t want an apology. I want an explanation.
I don\'t want to go out in this kind of weather.
Did you hear about Tom\'s plans for the weekend?
Don\'t forget to return the book to the library.
Don\'t hesitate to tell me if you need anything.
Tom couldn\'t persuade Mary to accept the money.
Tom didn\'t know whether to believe Mary or not.
